value.Name: Wordpress
value.Value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><FsPickler version="2.0.0.0" type="Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList`1[System.String]"><value flags="sequence"><elem>Authenticated Denial of Service (DoS)</elem><elem>Authenticated Revision History Information Disclosure</elem><elem>Unauthorized Category Removal from Post</elem><elem>Authenticated Attachment Name Stored XSS</elem><elem>Redirect Bypass</elem><elem>oEmbed Denial of Service (DoS)</elem><elem>Password Change via Stolen Cookie</elem><elem>Privilege Escalation / Content Injection</elem><elem>Potential Remote Command Execution (RCE) in PHPMailer</elem><elem>SQL injection vulnerability in the wp_untrash_post_comments function</elem><elem>Directory traversal vulnerability in the wp_ajax_update_plugin</elem><elem>Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the filesystem credentials dialog</elem><elem>SQL injection vulnerability in wp-includes/class-wp-query.php in WP_Query</elem><elem>Directory traversal vulnerability in the File_Upload_Upgrader class</elem><elem>Open Redirect</elem><elem>Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in oEmbed</elem></value></FsPickler>
